title: Designing Hybrid Language Learning Based on the Metaverse

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and basic understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Blended language learning experiences designed with metaverse platforms in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete language-based project assignments at over 80% proficiency using collaboration tools in metaverse environments
Learners can apply language skills by participating in virtual community activities at least three times weekly through hybrid learning systems
Learners can create and share language learning content at least three times using creative tools in metaverse platforms
Learners can perform dialogue scenarios reflecting cultural contexts with 90% accuracy in metaverse-based simulation environments

resources: Mobile-optimized metaverse platform (e.g., LINE VR, ZEPETO)
Asynchronous activity management tool compatible with LMS
Open-source template for virtual space construction
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
